statements: SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT residential_area_name, noise_level FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT id, residential_area_name FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level < 30 ORDER BY residential_area_name ASC;
SELECT id, regulation_details FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE residential_area_name LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT id, noise_level FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY noise_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level > 50 ORDER BY residential_area_name ASC;
SELECT residential_area_name, regulation_details FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, residential_area_name, regulation_details FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level BETWEEN 45 AND 55;
SELECT * FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE regulation_details LIKE '%residential%';
SELECT id, noise_level FROM noise_pollution_regulations WHERE noise_level < 40 ORDER BY noise_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels;
SELECT location, decibel_level FROM noise_levels WHERE decibel_level > 80;
SELECT id, location, date_recorded FROM noise_levels ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE date_submitted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, location, complaint_text FROM complaints ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE decibel_level > 80 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT location, decibel_level FROM noise_levels WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT AVG(decibel_level) AS average_decibel FROM noise_levels WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM noise_levels ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM complaints GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_complaints DESC;
SELECT * FROM NoisePollutionRegulations;
SELECT id, noise_level, residential_area_id FROM NoisePollutionRegulations;
SELECT * FROM ResidentialAreas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, postal_code FROM ResidentialAreas WHERE postal_code = '12345';
SELECT * FROM NoiseComplaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM NoisePollutionRegulations WHERE noise_level > 50 ORDER BY residential_area_id DESC
SELECT area_name, postal_code FROM ResidentialAreas WHERE postal_code LIKE '1%' ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT * FROM NoiseComplaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND complaint_details LIKE '%loud%' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC

SELECT N.id, R.area_name, NC.complaint_date FROM NoisePollutionRegulations N INNER JOIN ResidentialAreas R ON N.residential_area_id = R.id INNER JOIN NoiseComplaints NC ON NC.residential_area_id = R.id WHERE N.noise_level >= 60 AND R.area_name IN ('Meadowbrook', 'Lakeside')

SELECT N.id, R.area_name, NC.complaint_details FROM NoisePollutionRegulations N INNER JOIN ResidentialAreas R ON N.residential_area_id = R.id LEFT JOIN NoiseComplaints NC ON NC.residential_area_id = R.id WHERE NC.complaint_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY N.id ASC
SELECT * FROM noise_levels;
SELECT location_id, noise_level FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT location_id, noise_level FROM noise_levels ORDER BY noise_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM residential_areas WHERE area_name = 'Downtown';
SELECT violation_id, location_id, violation_date FROM noise_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM residential_areas;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT regulation_id, max_allowable_level FROM noise_regulations ORDER BY max_allowable_level DESC;
SELECT violation_date FROM noise_violations WHERE location_id = 3 AND violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT area_name, area_size, n.noise_level FROM residential_areas r JOIN noise_levels n ON r.area_id = n.location_id;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE decibel_level > 80;
SELECT id, location FROM noise_levels ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source FROM noise_sources WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT description FROM complaints WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT inspector, inspection_date FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE decibel_level > 70 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, decibel_level FROM noise_levels WHERE location LIKE 'A%'
SELECT inspector, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT source FROM noise_sources JOIN noise_levels ON noise_sources.location_id = noise_levels.id WHERE decibel_level < 60
SELECT description FROM complaints WHERE location_id IN (SELECT id FROM noise_levels WHERE location = 'Street A')
